changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: KFTP-1210 Parameters which control the run of the PopulateFinancialSystemDocumentHeadersFromKewJob

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Determines the maximum number of documents that the PopulateFinancialSystemDocumentHeadersFromKewJob will handle in a given run. Any non-numeric, zero, negative, or empty value will be treated as if the job should convert all available Financial System document header records.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Determines the maximum number of document headers that the PopulateFinancialSystemDocumentHeadersFromKewJob will read at once. Any non-numeric, zero, negative, or empty value will be treated as if the default value of 1000 has been chosen.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If a value is set, the PopulateFinancialSystemDocumentHeadersFromKewJob will only ppoulate a document if it has one of the given statuses. Note that this may mean that a run of the population job may fall short of hitting the number of documents processed set by KFS-SYS / PopulateFinancialSystemDocumentHeadersFromKewStep / POPULATION_LIMIT.

changeSet.author: KFS54
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSCNTRB-1761- Fund groups that allow backdating of the expiration date

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Fund groups that allow backdating of the expiration date.

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSCNTRB-1793 for standard roll sizes

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Counts of coins per roll for each standard roll. Note: each roll is defined in the format of denomination =countPerRoll; countPerRoll must be a positive integer; all 6 rolls shall be defined, separated by semicolon; the order of them does not matter.

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: If yes, commodity codes are automatically added to vendors when a REQS becomes a PO.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If yes (Y), commodity codes are automatically added to vendors when a REQS becomes a PO.

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: KFSCNTRB-846 Parameters that control the error certification tab requirements.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Defines the default number of fiscal periods that will require that the Error Certification tab be completed. If the fiscal period of the transaction exceeds the current fiscal period by more than the default, the Error Certification tab is required.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Specific sub-fund groups that are excepted from the DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_FISCAL_PERIODS_ERROR_CERTIFICATION_TAB_REQUIRED parameter. If the account used on the TO side includes sub-funds specified in this parameter, the number of fiscal periods associated with the sub fund should be used instead of the default to determine whether or not the Error Certification tab is required. Format of list is sub fund 1=number of fiscal periods; sub fund 2=number of fiscal periods.

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: Add parameters for KFSCNTRB-1156 Calculate ICR Encumbrances.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Identifies Origination Code to be used when creating ICR Transactions and transactions that should be excluded when calculating ICR encumbrances.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Identifies Encumbrance Balance Type codes that should be included when determining on which balances to calculate encumbrances.

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: KFSCNTRB-784 Modify Scrubber Job to validate and update the object type code when files are received from external sources.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Origination Codes where the object type will not be updated to match the object type assigned to the object code.

changeSet.author: KFSCNTRB-1020
changeSet.comment: KFSCNTRB-1020, Component and parameters which control how the Current Account Balance queries for results.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Identifies accounts that will have Cash Expenditure Authority and Fund Balance calculated for it on the Current Account Balance Screen. All other Budget Record Level codes will calculate Budget Balance Available.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Income object type codes.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Expense object type codes.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Encumbrance balance types.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Cash and other cash object codes.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Current liability object codes.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Fund Balance Object codes

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KKFSCNTRB-594 for Default chart code

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Used as the default chart when parameter DEFAULT_CHART_CODE_METHOD is 1 or 3. If ACCOUNTS_CAN_CROSS_CHARTS_IND is set to N, then this parameter should be blank.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Leave blank if a default chart should not be set on transactional docs; 1: Use the chart code on transactional docs in parameter DEFAULT_CHART_CODE as the default; 2: Use the initiator's primary department chart code as the default on transactional docs; 3: Use the initiator's primary department code as the default on transactional docs, if there is none, use the chart code in DEFAULT_CHART_CODE. If ACCOUNTS_CAN_CROSS_CHARTS_IND is set to N, then this parameter should be blank.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Charts that will be processed when year-end batch jobs Nominal Activity Closing, Balance Forward, and Encumbrance Forward are run. If no charts are specified, all charts will be processed.

changeSet.author: KFSCNTRB-1681
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSCNTRB-1681 allows Negative Accounting Lines on DV

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Flag to indicate whether or not negative accounting lines are allowed on the Disbursement Voucher (DV) document. A value of Y to will enable negative lines for DV, while a value of N will disable them.

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSCNTRB-1702 to add new type

update.where: nmspc_cd = 'KFS-FP' and cmpnt_cd = 'DisbursementVoucher' and parm_nm = 'VALID_PAYEE_TYPES_BY_PAYMENT_REASON' and appl_id = 'KFS'

changeSet.author: KFS53
changeSet.comment: Changes the KFS-GL / Encumbrance / USE_ICR_ENCUMBRANCE_IND to have "N" as a default value and changes the component to batch.

update.where: nmspc_cd = 'KFS-GL' and cmpnt_cd = 'Encumbrance' and parm_nm = 'USE_ICR_ENCUMBRANCE_IND' and appl_id = 'KFS'
